forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. West wind 9 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 51. West wind 8 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, this morning greets us with a brilliant and cheerful clarity, casting long shadows and igniting the skyline in warm hues of promise. The sun hangs high, illuminating the streets and the vibrant spirit of the city, while a gentle yet invigorating west wind rustles through, hinting at the coolness that will embrace the afternoon. As the day progresses, temperatures will gently descend, bringing a pleasant breath of cool air around 67 degrees. A glimpse towards the horizon reveals no fog to dampen the scenery; instead, the clarity of the day provides an extraordinary view of the Golden Gate, standing majestic against a perfectly blue sky.

As evening approaches, the conditions will remain largely clear, settling into a tranquil night with temperatures dipping to around 51 degrees. The breeze, though slightly stronger, is still inviting, encouraging evening walks or casual outings. Dressing in layers would be wise—perhaps a light jacket over a comfortable tee—perfect for navigating the shifts from sunny warmth to the cooler night air. Given the picturesque weather, it would be a wonderful day to explore the local markets or enjoy a quiet moment at a café, soaking in the beauty of the city as it transitions from day to evening.
